* BrightBlade snarled and yelled in surprise as Shredder's charges hit her 
in the chest and she flew head over heals from the boulder. She landed hard 
as she hit the ground, mech fluid dripping from the wound in her chest.
BrightBlade yipped in rage(which is what foxes do) and jumped to her 
feet...*

" You wanna fight? I'll give you a fight!!!!!!"

* BrightBlade swerved around a tree trunk and started to fiddle with the 
innards of her gun, she hadn't told Hell Beast that she could hot-wire 
weapons just for the fun of it.
She switched the charge cavity with an extra energy booster , which made the 
charges extra powerful. She smiled as she put the gun back together again, 
now the fun started.
BrightBlade jumped out from behind the tree and fired at the boulder, when 
the charge hit it the huge rock exploded into chunks. Dust rose up and 
chocked the air, it had been a pleasure to make sure that the charge had the 
force of a sticks of TNT.*
